parameters: \n<Charles>This should be it. We will be up and running any second now!
\n<Sabrina>Yeah, can’t wait to fight some punks.
\n<Charles>Wait, before we start should use code names?
\n<Charles>Because if we need to call each other, we can’t use our real names.
\n<Sabrina>Ooh-ooh, we can call ADAM “SILVER” cause his suit!
\n<Adam>Straight to the point, I like it!
\n<Sabrina>Nope. I want to be called HELLBRINGER.
\n<Charles>Why is it cause you say hell a lot?
(CHARLES snicker. SABRINA punches her fist into her open palm causing a small fireball
explosion to ignite upon contact. ADAM lets out a fake cough into his balled up fist.
(SABRINA extinguishes the fire then crosses her arms. CHARLES then claps loudly followed
by him rubbing his palms together.)
\n<Charles>And I will be the great MONITOR!
(CHARLES touches fingers together and he leans back in his chair. He crosses his legs.
ADAM and SABRINA stare at him blankly.)
(CHARLES gets out of the back of the truck. He starts the engine.)
(Before you leave there are extra items in the chest.)
\n<Charles>Oh yeah, take these items. They should help!
\n<Charles>Oh yeah, take these items. They should help!
\n<Charles>Oh yeah, take these items. They should help!
\n<Charles>Oh yeah, take these items. They should help!
\n<Charles>Oh yeah, take these items. They should help!
\n<Charles>Alright lets keep going, where to next!
(CHARLES typing stuff into the computers. SABRINA and ADAM are laying on the floor.)
\n<Sabrina>CHARLES we need a bed in here.
(ADAM lays on the floor looking at the patch he picked up.)
CHARLES you seem pretty focused over there.
Hey, CHARLES can we get a mattress?
CHARLES you seem pretty focused over there.
Hey, CHARLES can we get a mattress?
\n<Charles>A custom software that should help us out!
(CHARLES takes out a USB stick then hands it over to ADAM.)
(ADAM plugs it into his gauntlet. The screen on this gauntlet shows a downloading screen.
When it finishes it shows a cartoon computer head. Under it reads “Monitor System”)
\n<Charles>Yeah, it’s a system that will help us keep things streamline!
(CHARLES grabs his gauntlet and starts opening applications and scrolling through them.)
\n<Charles>Secure network communication. A private database and more!
Wow, yeah, this is pretty advanced.
Wow, yeah, this is pretty advanced.
\n<Charles>My I knew my business and computer degree would come in handy!
\n<Sabrina>Does this mean we get to use the truck?
\n<Charles>Of course! Feel free to use it!
\n<Sabrina>Just some patch one of the robbers drop. I told him not to worry about it,
\n<Adam>No, I think I’ve seen this before.
\n<Charles>Why don’t we try the monitor system!
(On the wall of monitors, a bunch of news articles, social media posts, and videos are pulled up.))
\n<Charles>ADAM is right this could be bigger...
\n<Sabrina>Wait, I think EDEN was talking about this!
\n<Charles>Hey, guys, you might want to see this...
\n<NEWS ANCHOR>The Knight CYCLONE just announced his new plans for the city.
(The news cuts to CYCLONE in front of the park fountain.)
\n<CYCLONE>As of today, I will be in charge of getting rid of this new gang.
\n<CYCLONE>My investigation has found they call themselves Dark Wings and they are very
dangerous. They have a strong hatred for Knights like, myself.
(The crowd boos at his last statement. The news cuts back to the announcer.)
\n<NEWS ANCHOR>If you have any information on this gang please the emergency number or
\n<Sabrina>Tsk doesn’t seem like he’s been doing much work.
I can do better than him!
(ADAM kicks the air. He then pauses. He squints his eyes then smuggly smiles.)
\n<Adam>It looks like we're gonna beat him to it...
I can do better than him!
(ADAM kicks the air. He then pauses. He squints his eyes then smuggly smiles.)
\n<Adam>Well, if he’s not gonna do it, we’re gonna do it.
(ADAM kicks the air. He then pauses. He squints his eyes then smuggly smiles.)
\n<Adam>You know what they say, “if you want something right, you gotta do it yourself”
\n<Charles>You’re not seriously going to take down an entire gang!?
\n<Adam>Why not, I wanna beat CYCLONE as his own game.
\n<Sabrina>ADAM’s right, We have to prove CYCLONE isn’t the hotshot he is!
\n<Charles>Well, if you two are up to the task I will give you my full support!
Great, we're gonna need all the help we can get!
Great, we're gonna need all the help we can get!
\n<Charles>Good point! Did you guys pick up any other clues?
\n<Sabrina>I think they mentioned something about a boss?
\n<Adam>Yeah, and a base but not the location.
\n<Sabrina>Yeah like anyone will give us information.
\n<Adam>Maybe not as regular people but as “Knights”
\n<Sabrina>Yeah SILVER and HELLBRINGER kicking butt and taking names!
\n<Adam>We might need to add to my name it’s a bit simple.
\n<Charles>Sure, I mean but I’m gonna need a request form.
(Everyone laughs. ADAM and SABRINA’s stomach grumbles.)
\n<Adam>We should postpone this for tomorrow, it is getting late.
\n<Charles>No problem! I'll be here when you two are ready.
\n<Charles>In the meantime, I'll do further digging into Dark Wings!
(Reminder your appearance matters to people to talk to)
(What would you like to talk to Charles about?)
\n<Sabrina>We got some hits but we're still lost.
\n<Adam>Yeah all we got is moving trucks, mohawk guy, and an old warehouse.
\n<Charles>Let me try the Monistor Data base.
\n<Charles>Well, all the robberies seem localized to the North, East, West, and South
Districts. But between all of them there's numerous abandoned warehouses.
\n<Adam>We really need to find that mohawk guy.
\n<Sabrina>Yeah, we'll get the info out of him!
\n<Charles>Do you have any clues where he might be?
\n<Sabrina>Someone said he smokes near Magic Burger but they didn't say which one.
\n<Charles>Well, the only Magic Burgers near the robbery sites are in the South and
\n<Charles>Woo, Look at us! We got our first lead!
\n<Adam>Oh, sorry I was just thinking of my new gadget idea.
\n<Charles>Hmm, the technology exist but not sure how long it would take us to make it.
\n<Adam>Uh hmm, With your help, I’d estimate a couple of days.
\n<Charles>Sounds Great! And that will give us enough time to prepare.
\n<Sabrina>Awww what!? I wanted to kick some ass already!
Sorry, We just got to prepare for now.
Look at this way, more time to come up with new moves!
\n<Sabrina>Hmm, I guess in the meantime I could practice some new moves out.
Sorry, We just got to prepare for now.
\n<Sabrina>Alright, but don’t think I’ll stay quiet about this.
\n<Charles>Heh ADAM, looks like we got our work cut out for us!
Look at this way, more time to come up with new moves!
\n<Sabrina>Oh right, I still need to master doing a backwards suplex!
\n<Charles>Oof, I would not like to be at the end of that!
(ADAM and SABRINA get up to leave.)
\n<Charles>Oh, ADAM come back anytime to talk about that gadget. And something else if you
(I should talk to Charles about the cloaking device.)
(Do you want to talk to him?)
\n<Charles>Yup! Doing some research on cloaking magi-tech.
\n<Adam>Great, you mind sending me that so I can go gather the materials?
\n<Adam>Hey, um what was the other thing you wanted to talk about?
CHARLES sighs and clears his throat.
\n<Charles>...so, I told you about my dad and how
Yeah, he was a great engineer...
Yeah, I remembered hearing it on the news...
Yeah, he was a great engineer...
\n<Charles>Yup, he was one of the best...
Yeah, I remembered hearing it on the news...
\n<Charles>...so,anyways after it happened everyone kinda forgot about it.
\n<Charles>Well, what if I told you the city is covering up something big.
\n<Charles>It’s just theories for now but do you know what FMP’s are?
\n<Charles>So you know that they only happen there is dense concentrated magic.
\n<Charles>Now here is a map of the city with FMP ratings
(CHARLES pulls a picture of the city.)
\n<Adam>Well, there is barely anything significant- looks normal to me.
\n<Charles>Right- but that isn’t the current ratings, this is.
(CHARLES pulls up on his computer a map of the city. The city gets marked with pulsing
\n<Charles>Well, I want you to find proof this wasn’t an accident...
\n<Charles>Exactly. My Dad was a perfectionist and genius. I doubt he would make such a big mistake.
\n<Charles>No. My dad would never mess up so badly.
\n<Adam>So, I’m guessing you want me and BREE to go look for some proof.
\n<Charles>Yes, please. It would mean a lot.
Alright, like what’s the worst that could happen?
Seems like a lot but I’ll think about
\n<Charles>Thank you so much. Hey let me know when you’re ready!
Alright, like what’s the worst that could happen?
\n<Charles>I mean breaking the law but that hasn’t stopped us now.
Seems like a lot but I’ll think about
\n<Charles>Sure, just come back if you change your mind...
(Players will have to locate FMP hotspots around the city.)
\n<Charles>Sure, just come back if you change your mind...
(You will now be transported back home. Use the computer to make the invisiblity belt. While
crafting is not deveploped yet it will be made automatically.)
(You will now be transported back home. Use the computer to make the invisiblity belt. While
crafting is not deveploped yet it will be made automatically.)
(ADAM and SABRINA are laying down on a mattress CHARLES bought. ADAM has his armor off but
his undersuit is still on. SABRINA just has her mask off. They lay side by side on the
How are you holding up BREE?
We need a plan next time.
How are you holding up BREE?
\n<Adam>Good, but not sure if I have a broken rib or not.
\n<Sabrina>We sure kicked some ass didn't we!?
We need a plan next time.
\n<Sabrina>Why? Ya don't you wanna get hurt?
\n<Sabrina>You know what else we need in here?
\n<Adam>Yeah, like we’ll find a freelancing nurse.
\n<Adam>You want to get yelled at again?
(Both of them groan loudly and gutturally. CHARLES opens the back of the truck door.)
\n<Charles>Rise and Shine! You guys need to check the news!
(CHARLES quickly climbs in the back of the truck. He quickly types in what he is looking
for. He pulls up a live video of the news. The news shows a news reporter in front of
Dark Wing’s hideout. The members of Dark Wings are being arrested in the background.)
\n<News Anchor>Shocking new development in the Dark Wings case. Recently, unknown parties
have been dealing with the gang.
(The news shows a silhouette of a person with a graphic with white question mark inside
\n<News Anchor>Could this be a rise in vigilantes or coincidences? Or just a rival gang
hit?  What is for sure this does not look good for CYCLONE
Would like to go back outside?
Where would you like to go?
What would you like to do?
What do you wanna change into?
What would you like to do?
What do you wanna change into?
\n<Charles>Yes, I want your guys’ thoughts on the audio recording?
\n<Charles>There’s not really much interesting about it but take listen to yourselves.
\n<Charles>It just sounds like something getting louder then fading.
\n<Adam>Or something passing by- like a train.
\n<Sabrina>Yeah, but we were nowhere near a train station.
\n<Adam>The ground did shake like we where near one.
\n<Sabrina>Well, ghosts are a thing so what if it was a ghost train?
\n<Charles>Certainly, in our magi-tech society anything is possible.
\n<Adam>Maybe, the church used to be a train station?
\n<Charles>But that wouldn’t explain how this connect to my dad’s work...
Hey, you can't give up that easily.
But there’s still a chance it is.
Maybe, but we’ve gone this far.
Hey, you can't give up that easily.
But there’s still a chance it is.
Maybe, but we’ve gone this far.
\n<Charles>But where would we find the old city records?
\n<Adam>We could go to the city library.
\n<Adam>The librarian might know. She’s a history nut.
\n<Charles>Perfect, looks like we’re were going next!
(The group begins to look over the maps. Some of them are single routes and trains. There
are 2 that catch their eye which are the complete routes of the subway system and the
(CHARLES uses his phone to scan both maps. He then puts them into his computer. He gets
\n<Charles>I know why you guys didn’t see the “ghost train...”
\n<Charles>Maybe because this map is for the subway system.
\n<Adam>Maybe because this map is for a subway system.
\n<Adam>How long has it been down there?
\n<Charles>It’s been unused for a couple of millennia now, so who is operating a train
\n<Sabrina>Well, that’s what we’re here to find out!
\n<Charles>But, how does this connect back to my dad?
Well, like you said, “In this magi-tech world anything is possible!”
They match so there’s no way it's a coincidence.
Well, there’s only one way to find out.
Well, like you said, “In this magi-tech world anything is possible!”
They match so there’s no way it's a coincidence.
Well, there’s only one way to find out.
\n<Charles>You maybe right but I still don’t see
\n<Charles>It’s the FMP detector, something is going off the charts!
(The map gets updated to show that there are large pulsating rings appearing downtown.)
\n<Adam>I don’t know but this really settles it. Whatever happened on that day, it wasn’t over.
\n<Sabrina>Well, what now, we barge into the power plant?
\n<Charles>If the power plant and the subway tunnels are emitting these constant FMP,
that means he must have wanted to use them for something.
\n<Charles>Maybe, a new energy system? But why the subway line?
\n<Charles>Right! My dad always complained about the traffic. He said if he ever had the
\n<Charles>Maybe, my dad always hated traffic. So he would jump at the chance to fix it.
\n<Charles>Well, maybe not a ghost train. But he always hated traffic so a newfangled
magi-tech train would be right up his alley.
\n<Charles>So are you guys up for it?
(CHARLES begins typing quickly on his computer.)
\n<Charles>I need to finish something I’m working on. Do you think we can explore tonight?
\n<Adam>Sure, but you just gave me an idea as well!
